label: clinical_signal_03_dx_renal_biomarker_study_004
content:
## 2024-03-25 Daily Operations Summary

- Active: 63
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 7

### Enrollment by Cohort

- 25mg: 16
- 50mg: 16
- 100mg: 18

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: RB-AE-0474, Description: urinary tract infection, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 25mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-0455, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 10mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-0416, Description: muscle cramp, Grade: 2, Relatedness: not related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 100mg

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: RB-PD-0428, Description: GFR measurement repeated due to hemolyzed sample, Severity: moderate
- PD ID: RB-PD-0432, Description: Urine sample collection outside 24h window, Severity: minor

### Events
- Site 01 monitoring visit completed, 1 findings
- Lab kit resupply dispatched to sites with low inventory
- Lab kit resupply dispatched to sites with low inventory

### Notes
- Week 4: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 64 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
